articles.title: Representative of Russian President to Far East Federal District here
Kim Jong Il meets new Chinese ambassador
articles.content:
Representative of Russian President to Far East Federal District here 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of the Russian Federation to the Far East Federal District, arrived here today.
 Arriving here in company with him were victor Andreyevich Tregubov, first deputy plenipotentiary representative of the president of the Russian Federation to the Far East Federal District, and officials of the ministry of foreign affairs, the Ministry of Economic Development and Trade, the Ministry of Railway Transport, the Mission of the Plenipotentiary Representatives of the Russian President and other officials concerned.    
 The guests were met at the airport by Yon Hyong Muk, member of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of foreign affairs, and other officials concerned, Russian ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Gennadievich Karlov and embassy officials.

articles.title: Industrial art exhibition opens
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il meets new Chinese ambassador 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, today met new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe.
 Kim Jong Il had a conversation with him in an amicable atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Choe Yong Hwa
Trade union members meet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Choe Yong Hwa 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il Saturday sent a wreath to the bier of Choe Yong Hwa, writer of the central committee of the Korean Writers Union, to express deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Foreign delegations and delegate here
Declaration on peace on Korean peninsula adopted
articles.content:
Foreign delegations and delegate here 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Botanical Garden of the Russian Academy of Sciences led by its vice-president Alexander Zemidov and a delegation of the Harbin, China, Association for Supporting Propagation of Kimjongilia arrived in Pyongyang by air yesterday to participate in the 6th Kimjongilia show to be held on the occasion of the February holiday.
 Meanwhile, a delegation of the Finland-Korea Association and Muhamad Kamal al Kadi, delegate of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, arrived here to participate in the "meetings to congratulate the sun of the 21st century".

articles.title: U.S. apology and reparation demanded
articles.content:
Declaration on peace on Korean peninsula adopted 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A joint council of civic and public organisations involving more than 200 organisations called a press conference at the press centre in Seoul on February 8 as regards a string of hostile remarks made by U.S. government officials against the DPRK  before adopting a declaration on peace on the Korean peninsula, Seoul-based MBC said.
 The organisation in the declaration demanded the U.S. government come out to negotiations with the DPRK for the stability on the peninsula, charging that Washington is persistently pursuing the hard-line policy toward the DPRK, putting its interests above anything else.
